articles.title: Japan's space agency to launch XRISM and SLIM moon Sniper spacecraft on 26 August. All you need to know | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Japan's JAXA to launch XRISM and SLIM spacecraft on 26 August. SLIM aims to demonstrate accurate landing techniques, while XRISM will study the universe's hottest regions and objects with the strongest gravity.
